structure.unit: SOVEREIGNTY AND JURISDICTION OF THE COMMONWEALTH

law.catch_line: of United States flag at half-staff.
law.text: The Governor is authorized and requested to issue a proclamation calling upon state officials to display the United States flag at half-staff on all state buildings from sunrise to sunset for not less than one (1) day in the event of the death of Kentucky emergency response personnel in the line of duty.
law.history: Created 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 43, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2015.
